sentences.english: This gave the Chinese people a better sense of balance in regard to this-worldlincss and other- worldliness .
sentences.chinese: 這使得中國人對於入世和出世具有良好的平衡感。

sentences.english: Unlike those of the West, Chinese loans are "no strings attached."
sentences.chinese: 不象西方國家，中國的貸款是“無附帶條件”。

sentences.english: Marxism faith is magistral faith of China.
sentences.chinese: 馬克思主義信仰是中國社會的主導信仰。

sentences.english: The ah, China, really is a troublous times this year.
sentences.chinese: 哎，中國，今年實在是多事之秋。

sentences.english: It turns out Jialing is one of the oldest and largest motorcycle manufacturers in its home country.
sentences.chinese: 嘉陵是中國最古老也是最大的摩托車生產商之一。

sentences.english: Poetry prophecy is an exotic flower in remote mountains which is in full bloom in our Chinese classics hundred-flower garden.
sentences.chinese: 詩讖是盛開在中國古典文學百花園裏的一株深山奇葩。

sentences.english: The educational aim of Huijia School is to "be a great Chinese".
sentences.chinese: 匯佳學校的培養目標是“做一個偉大的中國人”。

sentences.english: China's fertility rate may be much lower than official estimates.
sentences.chinese: 中國人口高增長率可能會比政府估計的要低很多。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, there are more than 70 Chinese-funded businesses in Brazil and 300 Brazilian-funded businesses in China.
sentences.chinese: 同時，中國在巴西投資興建了70多家企業。

sentences.english: Changchun Light technology institute is China most early and most has the great reputation optics development facility.
sentences.chinese: 長春光機所是中國最早和最負盛名的光學研究機構。

sentences.english: Sketch actor Zhao Benshan is a household name in China.
sentences.chinese: 趙本山在中國家喻戶曉。

sentences.english: The very major problem that Chinese mathematics faces is lack of leadership.
sentences.chinese: 當今中國數學界面對的大難，便是缺乏領導者。

sentences.english: China was second with 32, four behind the United States.
sentences.chinese: 中國有32枚，比美國少4枚，排在第二位。

sentences.english: Encourage South Korea ball exercises, collision Chinese fishing boats.
sentences.chinese: 鼓勵南韓實彈演習，衝撞中國漁船。

sentences.english: But China’s surplus is dropping faster.
sentences.chinese: 但是中國的往來賬戶盈餘漏失很快。

sentences.english: Ancient Chinese literary theory is living, and its structure is organic.
sentences.chinese: 中國古代文論是生命性文論，是一種整體有機結構觀。
